title: The Fireflowers of Yet Sing Low
creator_credit: Tri-Pix Productions and National Broadcasting Company
brief_description: A colourful story about Yet Sing Low, a young Chinese boy, who accidently spoils the fireworks display for the Chinese New Year. However, the people of Hong Kong are not disappointed as a friendly, sneezing dragon comes to the boy’s assistance.
